headline: Nyxoah Secures Financing Commitments of up to U.S. $77 Million to Drive U.S. Commercialization of Genio
summary: INSIDE INFORMATIONREGULATED INFORMATION Nyxoah Secures Financing Commitments of up to U.S. $77 Million to Drive U.S. Commercialization of Genio Financings are comprised of equity investments, including from Cochlear, Resmed and Nyxoah’s Chairman and Management, and a convertible bond.
